game_description: Scare your friends and family in VR with AFFECTED: The Manor! If you love to scare yourself witless, or just enjoy watching your friends and family freak out in VR, AFFECTED: The Manor is for you! With simple controls and no puzzles to solve or keys to find, The Manor is a haunted walkthrough that holds nothing but scares and screams for both experienced gamers and newcomers alike. AFFECTED: The Manor â€“ Complete Edition contains the original haunted house walk-through experience of The Manor plus TWO additional gameplay modes! THE GAUNTLET is a spooky speedrun mode with each player ranked by their time, and how much they screamed! Compete in global leaderboards to set the best time! The DARKNESS brings a whole new experience as you attempt to work your way through unseen areas of The Manor with only your candle to cast light into the darkness. The Complete Edition also offers a host of new Oculus Achievements, several new inclusivity options including support for 10 languages.
Languages: English, French (France), German, Japanese, Korean, Spanish (Argentina), Spanish (Chile), Spanish (Colombia), Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Peru), Spanish (Puerto Rico), Spanish (Venezuela)

review_2: I am a lover of scary. And this game really brought it. You can't be fooled by the price or videos of it. It is pretty freaking scary. The jump scares are fabulous. The suspense is awesome. Watching others play it is hilarious! Great game over all!
review_3: There was this game, Affected the Manor, and the walkthrough from 2019 looked really good, scary, nice atmosphere etc. So when I saw they made a "complete edition" I decided to get it... Bad mistake.. the first 5 minutes of the 2019 walkthrough were much scarier than the whole "new, complete" version experience... Sure it was nice to do all the different choices ending up in different locations... but that was it.... same non scary girl all the time, even laughable most of the time.. Not scary at all, nothing like the first version, way less on the graphic design, the first walkthrough I saw looked really good and really scary.. sad to see they took all that out for the "complete version"....misleading and a huge letdown... waiting for 7th Guest, which seems way better... And no response at all for any of the bad reviews by the developers whatsoever...
review_4: What if there was a story line, and who is the little girl and others in the photos? I want to know what happened and how did it get that way. It has potential like it would be cool if you can go more places like haunted towns or family graveyard or haunted garden or something, travel by boat on a haunted lake and the boat gets bumped or tipped over maybe a ghost sitting on the boat or as a jump scare. IMAGINE GOING THROUGH THE MANOR WITH OTHER PLAYERS. A CO-OP MODE WOULD BE SO MUCH FUN AND FUNNY. Other than that it's fun but everything doesn't need to be demonic. I indeed had butt quacks tho.
review_5: This is great but no add ons new routes rooms etc can only be even better...
